actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to establish an Office for Under-Banked and Un-Banked Consumers.
short_title: Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2018

summary.text:
Improving Access to Traditional Banking Act of 2018 

This bill amends the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to establish in the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau the Office for Under-Banked and Un-Banked Consumers. The office must, in part: (1) report on impeding factors for individuals and families that do not participate in the banking system, and (2) develop strategies to increase such participation.
